document_data.name: Improved Mirror Image
document_data.mainbody: '''''Improved mirror image''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[ninja]]s. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: A ninja used this spell to create a mirror image of themselves. The illusion could move up to {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} from the ninja. The illusion was required to face the same target as the ninja, but acted independently and able to use different weapons. If a target struck the illusion, it acted as would a person injured or killed in combat, and felt solid. Similar to the ''[[mirror image]]'' spell, the illusion caused no damage to the target. A ninja was able to summon more than one illusion, depending on their skill level.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic component|somatic]] component, [[kuji-kiri]] hand gestures.
